Formula-building rule for restricted universal quantifier (deduction rule).  (Contributed by NM, 4-Mar-1997.)  Reduce dependencies on axioms.  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 29-Dec-2019.)

 Formula-building rule for restricted universal quantifier (deduction rule).  (Contributed by NM, 4-Mar-1997.)
statement:
ralbidva.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
ralbidva $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. A ps <-> A. x e. A ch ) ) $.
$d ph x $.
